altTitles.en: ルーズ　コントロール

description.en:
"Please sleep with me!" exclaims a 25 year-old virgin, wanting to get rid of her complex. Vigorously "playing", the celebrity Mitsuru and Hanoka become sex friends. Even though it was only supposed to be sex between the two, the truth is whenever seeing the clumsy Mitsuru's real face, she is easily attracted too but will she realize it?  
Includes short story:  
Sayaka, a 28-year-old freelance writer, is nearing the age of thirty. She's been in the same job for six years, and she's got a newbie on her back about her writing… The only thing she has is the idol Tsubasa, whom she admires as an unrequited love, until she meets the handsome and mysterious fortune teller, Kuroki.
